name: epitaxially
content:

in a way that involves the growth of a thin crystal (= any solid consisting of atoms or molecules that are arranged in a regular structure) on top of another crystal, with both having a similar shape and structure: be grown epitaxially The solar cell is grown epitaxially on a growth substrate.epitaxially grown The layers are composed of epitaxially grown crystals.
